title: Arcade Poro Ward Gifitng
body: I want to gift my friend the Arcade Poro Ward, but I only see it in the Dungeon Pass and I cannot gift that to my friend. The ward skin is not available in the ward skin category in the store. Is there any way to gift the ward to my friend? I would even gift them the Dungeon Pass if I can.

replies.body:
For the time being that Arcade Poro is only available in the Dungeon Pass. It may show up in the store at a later date, but I don't have that info yet.

With that being said, go ahead and hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). There's a chance that we might be able to work something out.
